page.title: 13 Astley Abbots House
page.content: The{House}was built in the{1600's and was an old{Hunting Lodge.}The present owner bought it for Â£3,000 just after the 1939-45 War. It is now worth over Â£90,000. The House has many{old oak beams}and the walls are covered with{pictures}of the{present owner's family.} The House has a beautiful{garden}and a part_time gardener is employed to look after it. If you visit the garden you will see large{cedar trees,}an orchard, a {dovecote,}a{fish pond}and a special section where{herbs}are grown and sold. There are 30{bee hives}and 70 {sheep}are kept, which will be sold at market. The owners are going to{China}and {Japan}for their annual{holiday.
